website_summaries.verdict: Priced right and boasting a durable, water-resistant construction, excellent visibility, and a comfortable fit, this reflective vest is a hands-down winner.
pros: High quality 300 denier fabric is robust and ideal for outdoor use
Soft inner lining paired with a water-resistant exterior keeps dogs comfortable and dry in inclement weather
Specially designed to reduce rubbing and chafing
Bright color with reflective strips and prints on the front, sides, and back ensure optimal visibility in all conditions
cons: Great for mild to cold weather, but may be too cozy for warmer climates

customer_reviews.title: Did a good job in protecting my dog during hunting season.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dog vest to protect my golden retriver during hunting season. The vest was easy to put on and take off. She seemed comfortable and it didn’t slow her down. She was able to walk and play normally. Sometimes she would try to pull it off with a little scratch but wasn’t able to remove it and she was quickly on to her next adventure. After a long walk it sometimes became un-centered over her back but was still doing its job and did not hinder her in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my dogs while bird hunting. Been out three times now with it and it survived the trips. My dogs would go into the bushes after the birds and so far the vest held. The hunter orange really helps with keeping me informed on the location my my dogs when they are in tall grasses and in the woods. The distinctive reflective paw prints also allows me to identified that is my dog or another person's. I'm sure I will also find this useful in keeping them visible on walks in dark and unlighted streets.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: Bright and fits my dog
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is perfect. Bright and with reflectives that make your dog visible. I have a 22lb beige cockapo. Small fit her perfectly. She is small but deep chested so I was concerned it won't fit her. We go hiking a lot and with hunting season around the corner, I wanted to get something that will make her stand out and not look like a baby deer. I haven't tested it out yet in the woods but we will soon this weekend. Definitely serves the purpose of making your dog visible from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Vrushali C

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This blaze orange vest makes my dog easy to see in daylight and the reflective parts make him visible at night too. The best fits my dog well and stays on him even though he is very active running through heavy brush all the time. The fabric is tough and so far, is holding up to the rough treatment my dog challenges it with. I've bought other, more expensive vests made of vinyl that don't stay on or stand up to the abuse my dog dishes out. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W

customer_reviews.title: PERRRRFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely PERFECT!!! I have looked for a few months for something for job site to go on my dog. Not only does it say safety pup, it’s very durable, can be adjusted to fit, it’s actually high visibility color orange. Which orange is all I use considering my dog is black brindle. It’s just all around the best product. Now, if I could find a hard hat to go with jacket it would be amazing. Tried dog motorcycle helmet but not right for ears. Just perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: V C

customer_reviews.title: Great vest with one caveat
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this vest. It has a lot of reflective areas and it’s orange color is great for keeping track of my dog when she’s off leash in the woods. It’s light weight and my dog doesn’t mind having it on. My one complaint, and it’s a big one, is that after a couple months the reflective trim start separating from the vest. I don’t sew, so I tried using silver duct tape to reattach it, but the tape wouldn’t stick to the underside of the vest. So I left the duct tape in place and drove staples through the detached part. It seems okay now, however, this seems to be a common problem judging by the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great little safety vest!
customer_reviews.text: I have put hunter orange vests on my dogs ever since one of my dogs was shot during hunting season (some hunter thought a golden retriever was a deer...) and these are easy to fit, are pretty waterproof and are very washable after a muddle outing. The binding on the outer edge of the vest started to tear away after two years of wearing it but since they wore them every single day, I think this is acceptable. I don't hike with my dogs after dark but the reflective parts do make the dogs look even less like deer. I am on my second pair of vests and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Farr

customer_reviews.title: Great vests
customer_reviews.text: We live in a rural area and our dogs have free rein of 10 acres. Safety and visibility are key. Our dogs are each between 45-55 lbs. The medium was a perfect choice. Dogs don't mind them at all. Now they get excited when we put them on because they know it is outside-time! UPDATE: I tried another brand that was a little cheaper, and it was not worth it. They only lasted for 3 months, so I am doing a 2nd order of the SatefyPup XD. Our 1st order lasted 1 year + (even with a high-activity young pup), hoping the 2nd order lasts as long, if not longer!
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Your Doggo Safe During Hunting Season and Beyond
customer_reviews.text: I live in PA and we have weekend hunting. I already had a vest for my one Siberian Husky, but needed to pick up another one for my newer addition. This vest is not only brighter but also longer than the other brand I had. The only issue with this vest: It does not have a hole on top for a harness/leash connection. I solved that with a knife, but it would be nice to have it already cutout. When my other one wears out, I will be purchasing a second one of these for my black & white Husky. 100% recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dog safety
customer_reviews.text: This large size fit a 24.5" chest 42 pound dog very,very good. It seems to be made durable, and the bright orange color with silver reflective strips should do the trick for visibility in low light or rainy days. The photos attached do not capture the color depth of the Vest. I suspect this is due to the reflective nature of the Vest. The lower strap shows the color more accurately in the picture. The Vest feels like it is water repellent, but it is not insulated and so is for warmer fall weather, like about now (end of September in southern New England.) Otherwise you can put it over another coat if your dog needs it! I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Narlothep

customer_reviews.title: More Than Just For Hunting Season
customer_reviews.text: I have a big brown dog that could easily be mistaken for a small deer by a drunken hunter. Living in the back woods, I wanted to be sure my puppers didn't become the victim of an amateur outdoorsman during the season. What I didn't expect is how great the visibility is for our daily walks through the woods. Every time we go out, in season or not, he puts on the vest. No matter where he roams, and he loves to roam, I can keep an eye on him. It's fantastic. I'd highly recommend one for anybody who lives in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Merrill

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VESTS - MUST HAVE FOR HUNTING SEASON
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 for my dogs: Large for my 60-pound pit and 70-pound lab-mix, and Medium for my 40-pound terrier mix. They all fit well. The bright orange color can be seen clearly from anywhere, and the silver paw print on the vest reflects even faint light in darkness. When walking them during the hunting season, I put them on my dogs so I feel safe near the wood. My dogs can move freely with them on and they don't mind wearing them at all. The vests are easy to put on, easy to clean, and they're water-repellent. I'm very satisfied with the quality, as well as the seller merchant's services. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cucumber Field

customer_reviews.title: Simple, well-designed, inexpensive peace-of-mind
customer_reviews.text: My 95 lb Hovawart finally manged to lose his today while we were out mushrooming so I am ordering another. He doesn't mind it at all, seems to like it. Of course that is probably because he associates it with getting out in the woods. In addition to giving me peace of mind during hunting season, there is another subtle but important virtue to having him wear it. I can visually track him easily without having to focus on him, which enhances my ability to daydream and isn't that what we really go into the forest for?
customer_reviews.author: Scott L. Dulin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, high visibility, and easy to fit
customer_reviews.text: I live in a rural area, and my dog goes out to potty off leash. This is perfect for hunting season to be sure she’s high visibility. It’s decently made, and easy to fit and take on and off her. Happy with my purchase, would recommend it. Unsure about the water retardancy because she rolls in the snow and cokes back soaked no matter what. I’m sure it would be duke to walk a normal dog in the rain and help them stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: Swattsx

customer_reviews.title: Did its job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our puppy, who at the time was about 6 months old. She didn't seem to mind it when she wore it and it stayed on well even as she ran and tore through the woods and creek for the week. I was pretty impressed! Coincidentally, there were a few other dogs up there with the same vest on and theirs all lasted the week very well also. I feel like this will last awhile and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lolaloo

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this medium vest for my 37 lb dog. It is thicker then the old ones I had and stays in place while she is playing all day with other dogs. The snow just fell off of it. I think she is comfortable in it as she never tries to take it off. Very happy with it and ordered another one for my other dog. I am impressed on how it doesn't slip side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Our pup can be seen
customer_reviews.text: We have a male Chihuahua/whipette dog. He loves going out into the woods, mountains, lakes etc. Problem is he's small and often we lose sight of him. Problem solved! This handy safety-pup jacket allows us to see him 100 times better! Material is wet weather resistant. Stitching is pretty good and the Velcro is good, not cheap crap like others we've purchased. Sizing was spot on if you follow the chart they have. We feel better knowing we have eyes on him while out enjoying nature. Good product, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shop_a_holic👍

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Sizing is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to keep my full size (60 lb) Golden doodle safe during hunting season and visible on walks. I got him a Large and it’s a perfect fit. The best is Velcro so super easy to put on and off. It’s water resistant but not lined for warmth. Very happy with the reflective strips and decals! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality but should have gone down a size.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and water sheds nicely. I do wish I would have purchased a L instead of XL. We have a Newfoundland who is about 130#. He’s long and muscular but still more sleek than massive. There’s a lot of extra velcro after it’s fastened. My fault, though, I didn’t take the time to measure. I just took for granted that if an XL fit a Golden Retriever it should work for our Newfie. He’s rough and tough and it still stays securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: Spicer216

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vest! I got it last night and put on my pup. I feel a lot more confident now letting her out in the evenings to potty since I can see where she is at all times. I would highly recommend this to anyone. Great quality, color, texture. I have one small thing to say though, I do wish that on the back of the vest, there was a small hole to pull my dog's harness rings through vs me having to pull up the vest to put her on her lead. (Like the ones sweaters and jackets have.) That is a tiny negative in a sea of positives for this vest though!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and great reflective quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the reflective jacket. Our large, slender, elegant Weimie was fine with it and wore it into the woods with us and did much jumping over stone walls and downed trees and came home with it still attached and fitting well. We were all in the woods for over an hour hiking and bushwhacking and the jacket held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Weimie

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Bought a large size for my 61lb German Shepherd a couple months ago. My property abuts a National Forest and there are deer aplenty in the area, hence the need for a “hunting vest” for the dog. Great fit, easy on and off. She wears it from about 7:30am til 11am, or so, every day. During that time she’s very active chasing tennis balls (some of which go off into the woods), she also gets interested in smells or sounds in the woods and enjoys investigating. Great visibility, especially when it’s still a bit dark - just before sunrise. Has held up well. Does not restrict her movement in any way. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RN31

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!  Extremely Reflective
customer_reviews.text: We bought the safety yellow vests years ago to walk with our dogs daily along our country roads and are still using them. They have held up remarkably well although washing them in the clothes washer (once) made them a bit more limp and a few of the smaller reflective pieces have started to flake. We recently bought the blaze orange ones to use in areas where there might be hunters. The reflective trim on these vests is so reflective they almost look as though they are emitting light. No dog we've had has really minded wearing them at all. They are waterproof as we walk in all weather but obviously don't cover everything.
customer_reviews.author: Trivia Goddess

customer_reviews.title: No more hidding!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be able to see the dogs off leash- I have a brown husky (blends in the high dessert) and wesite (blends in the snow) I love these vests so I can instantly spot them far away off leash. I also like that they are super reflective for safety. Both dogs are long, i wish this was a bit longer to cover their entire back for wet weather, but it still works as a good rain fly for the most part!
customer_reviews.author: savvygrl

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for! My Chesapeake Bay Retriever is nearly invisible when in the woods surrounding my house. With this vest I can spot her with no trouble at all. The vest is lightweight and goes on in seconds with the Velcro straps. The vest also stays in place perfectly, even when running through the woods. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Don Flint

customer_reviews.title: A great vest for my dog during hunting season.
customer_reviews.text: The best vest for my dog during the hunting season. Very reasonably priced, it fits him well and it does a good job of making him visible during hunting season. I liked the jacket so much I bought a second one for my other dog who was wearing a more inferior vest. The reflective features actually work very well at night when I use my flashlight to escort my dog to the woods to do his business. I can seem him very well when he wears his vest. I highly recommend to others looking for a good visible vest for hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: S. F. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful vest for a wild dog
customer_reviews.text: Stays in place and is very visible! Other vests rotate around the dog. This one did not, nicely stayed on her back. Holds up to crazy wilderness dog running through brush, no ripping. Kept her back dry when in the rain. Some reflective parts. Wonderful, would buy again. A XLarge fit our 84lb german shepherd with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie

customer_reviews.title: Great dog vest!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits all of our dogs well. We have 3 dogs all different sizes and shapes. The adjustable velcro straps make it easy to fit to their body type. We take our dogs hiking through woods, rivers, brush, snow, and they held up through it all. They didn't get caught or snagged on anything and they're easy to clean. You can either wipe them clean or throw them in the washer. I hang them to dry, and they air dry very quickly. We mostly got these for visibility purposes, protection against hunters, and so we don't lose 'em! The color is bright and just as pictured. I would highly recommend these vests!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great safety vest
customer_reviews.text: Great for making my dog visible in the woods during hunting season. The reflective strips are also excellent for visibility to traffic on roads in the dark. Easy on and off with velcro closures, I leave the neck closed, slip it over the head and only fasten the belly strap. My Aussie has long hair but it's easy enough to keep it out of the velcro strap. The only drawback is that the material is not very sturdy and Aussie managed to tear the fabric on the back, running through the underbrush. Easy enough to sow up and can't expect too much for the inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.author: Tinka

customer_reviews.title: and this vest lights up in car headlights like a fishing trawler at midnight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Large and it fits my 78lb Rottie mix with strap length to spare. Length wise she it doesn't cover her entire back, but it does cover sides. It is waterproof so what is covered stays dry (it's not sold as a raincoat) I live in a rural subdivision with no street lights, and this vest lights up in car headlights like a fishing trawler at midnight, the dog can be seen from at least 1/4 mile away, possibly further. So between the dogs vest and my safety vest we make quite a spectacle on the streets at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Fit our golden retriever well and easy to put on. Makes him highly visible when he is running through our woods. We were concerned that he might be shot by a deer hunter because his color is so close to that of a deer. He is hard on it because of squirming under barbed wire fence and running through heavy brush but our original one is still intact although with a few little tears. I have already bought a new one for when this one gives up the ghost.
customer_reviews.author: Leonora Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Not "totally" rip resistant but close.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these vests 2 XL for each of my one year old GSDs they fit well and very reflective at night. They have been through the streams heavy wooded brush (not totally stick resistant) one got a few slits in it from either branches or thorny vines. Since I'm not the best sewing person I decide to fix the slits with packing tape with the fibers in it and has held up great! My third one I bought for my 8 year old Boston Terrier size small and it fits her great. These work great for raincoats too.
customer_reviews.author: WeSeyDogs

customer_reviews.title: Hi-Viz, Easy to adjust, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This was the first year we were still in Northern Michigan with the dogs when deer hunting season started, and after opening day, we realized we needed some safety gear for them to wear on walks, even just in our neighborhood. This arrived in 1-day, is lightweight enough to go under their harnesses without adjustment, and easily adjusts with Velcro to fit both dogs. It definitely makes them visible- the orange is hunter orange and the straps and detailing are reflective.
customer_reviews.author: sjp2012

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Not flimsy. Fits nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. Its Sturdy with Strong Velcro that you can customize... Tighten or loosen. Once fitted I don't resize the velcro around the neck... I just slip the vest over the dog's head and then just Velcro on the belly- quick and easy. No arms to put thru. When you're done your walk you just undo the velcro that is under the belly and slip it off over the head . the XL size fits the HUGE golden retreiver who is a gentle giant and the size LARGE fits the normal sized labs. The trim is very reflective and the orange is great to spot from far away.
customer_reviews.author: cloudy skies

customer_reviews.title: well constructed. highly reflective
customer_reviews.text: the large fit our 70-pound lab/pyrenees perfectly it's very reflective under headlights, and the bright orange really helps us keep track of him in the tall grass and fields. We haven't had it long enough to comment on its durability, but it appears to be well constructed with heavy fabric and straps (which are plenty long to be adjusted for size)
customer_reviews.author: stareditor

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Well made and definitely increases the visibility of my dog at night - I noticed a clear difference in how drivers paid attention when we cross a busy road on our way to the park. Hoping the Velcro lasts well - a possible improvement would be having buckles and some flex in the neck strap
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vest because we were going to start taking our dog hiking with us during deer hunting season. She was in between sizes and SafetyPup/SJS was quick to respond when I sent them a question about which to buy. They suggested going with the larger size, and they were right. So far we've only used the vest twice, but it is holding up well. It stays in place even though we leave a little extra length in the strap. The velcro seems tough. Dirt mostly brushes or wipes off. And it is super bright and reflective. And cute! We've been getting lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Visible , durable and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 German Shepherds to wear for visibility since we live by a lot of woods and hunting season is open. My smaller, female shepherd is wearing a size large and my my male who is a little larger and longer is wearing an XL. Both dogs are around 70 to 80 lbs ... Vests are water repellent, visible and very easy to put on. I’m very happy with this purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safety vest. Waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 70 lb Labradoodle well. It's lightweight so that my furry friend doesn't get too hot with this on. It's waterproof. The Velcro straps secures it on him well. And walking with this on keeps him and I safe when crossing the street. Many people have stopped to ask where I got it. Amazon, of course!
customer_reviews.author: GheriNJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! I get worried about my dog at night when I let him outside to go to the bathroom. He tends to roam far. And I love that this has reflective designs on it! So it’s a bright orange for the daytime to see and reflective at night! Less worried about him now! And it fits perfectly! Probably going to buy a spare just to have!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I love this vest but my furbaby does NOT because of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest but my furbaby does NOT because of the small strip of velcro and how well it works! When I go to remove it, she freaks out because of the noise. Also I think it may rub on her undercarriage because of it's newness. Her old one is warn out and a different brand but it has a 6" wide velcro area and is softer on her undercarriage. I would suggest making a wider, less sticky velcro area to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Tessofvt

customer_reviews.title: he said it looked like it was lit up
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL for my 103 lb Chocolate lab. We wanted something bright for him to wear on our walks. Our neighborhood does not have sidewalks so we walk in the street. The first time he wore it, it was still light out but close to dusk. A car came down the street and stopped to tell us how bright the vest was, he said it looked like it was lit up. Our dog loves to wear it, it means is we are going for a walk and he seems to prance around like he is showing it off. It also has a slimming affect.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Safety Gear for your Pup!
customer_reviews.text: Just fantastic! Great quality, perfect length. We have 2 large forested animal sanctuaries and hike them daily. Fall and Winter get nerveracking due to hunters who come in illegally to poach. We have had our dogs wear orange mesh types of vests for years, but this is so much better and can be worn over their law enforcement types of harnesses, I'll just cut a small slit and bring the metal leash loop through.
customer_reviews.author: Givethemsanctuaryorg

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: We take our dog on hikes with us in the woods on our property, and on trails in parks. Plus, we walk him on the road in our neighborhood when playing Pokemon Go, or on our workouts. This makes us feel better that hunters won't shoot him or us, cars can see him and if he gets off leash somehow, that we (or the hunters or the cars) would be able to see him. Fits him well, and doesn't seem to make him uncomfortably hot, even in the heat of summer. We like it so much, we bought one for both my brother's hunting dog and my husband's brother's escape artist husky. They both seem to love them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Provides Excellent Visual Protection
customer_reviews.text: Have two Dobermans - male and female - male is larger and the same size fits both very well. Velcro straps placed correctly for Doberman body. Vest is durable and cleans easily. I'm a sportsman so NO issues with hunters and guns - but there are some idiots out there and if they offered these with ballistic panels I'm sure others like me would spend the extra $$ on them. Very pleased. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: WV Subscriber

customer_reviews.title: Can't hide in the woods now!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my large German Shepard and fits perfect. No more stepping in and out to hook up. Over the head and one belly strap and he is off and running in the woods and he can be seen for a long distance. Great purchase and price.
customer_reviews.author: elder

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest for Hiking During Hunting Season!
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight (so they dogs don't overheat when wearing them) and does not irritate the dogs, The Large fits both my thin female black lab and my larger male golden retriever. Great color for high visibility while hiking during hunting season - some hunters actually remarked that they saw the dogs right away because of their vests. Light reflective element is great too and makes them easily visible in the dark. Water resistant as well for those pesky rain or snow showers. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: heelqueen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my pup safe
customer_reviews.text: This vest works great for my dog. Product has held up really well. I bought it because we let our dog walk off leash around the yard, and we live in a wooded area where people tend to hunt nearby. His colors look very similar to that of a white tail deer, and we don’t want him to be inadvertently mistaken for one by some hunter and let a preventable mishap ruin everyone’s day. The vest also works great for walks on and off leash, as it is highly visible to passing cars.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Overall Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This canine safety vest was rated the best for the money in the reviews. That's what sold me on it. Our Lab is 90 lbs and it fit him well. My only complaint is that the material is quite thin and flaps easily in the wind. It's secure though but I wish the material were a little heavier/more durable. Since it fits properly, I'd be willing to pay a bit for more that extra requirement as our dog rips and runs through the woods often. Overall, though, very good purchase and probably great for night time walks if you live in the city.
customer_reviews.author: D. harrison

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: The XL fits our 100lb Newf puppy well, with growing room. I’ve got the Velcro the tightest setting... glad I followed the sizing chart, it should fit him till full grown if he’s kept lean and healthy! Reflective, bright and quality. I’m happy!! No hunter will be confusing our Newf for a bear in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 125lb Lab.
customer_reviews.text: Great visibility and very reflective at night. The only thing is the material is thin. The previous one tore up in a season of going through thick woods. They are perfect for just walking your dog around the block. They seem a little light duty for a hunting dog. That said we still bought a second one the next year. Plenty good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Our dog wears this vest everyday on our morning walk. We walk in a wooded area and encounter hunters from time to time so I feel better with her wearing this. The vest is extremely reflective at night and glows (very) bright if a flashlight or headlights shine on it. We had an issue with the velcro falling off the first vest after a week of use and the customer service was awesome. They sent us a replacement vest no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Flojos

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: After trying multiple safety vests, all of which my dog tore off almost instantly, this one seems like a keeper. The stress points are not at the neck or other places where she is likely to tear them, and the material is more durable than most. If you're tired of replacing safety vests that get lost in the woods or torn, this might be the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Keeps my pup visible on our morning runs. I have a 55 lb Australian shepherd and the size medium fit him well (he just looks a little silly with all of his poof sticking out-but not a product defect). He doesn't seem to mind wearing it and it doesn't cause him to overheat either, which was one of my main concerns. I really like that the neck AND belly band are adjustable. It makes for a very customized fit. Also, the paw print heart is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: MinnesotaRun

customer_reviews.title: Great vests
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these for each of our dogs. They fit and work very well - water and play proof and highly reflective. One of our dogs ate two of her previous vests of different brand/style. The others fit too loosely in spots and she chewed them off. She's more comfortable in this vest as it's contoured much better and doesn't bother her. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because it can be a little awkward lining up the belly Velcro straps but that is very minor.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SAFETY FOR YOUR PET
customer_reviews.text: We live in the country and our dogs are not fenced. I bought one of these for my dog during hunting season and it really makes him visible. It is well made, but the fabric has torn several times and had to be repaired. I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: So everyone knows Boarder Collies are high energy and temperamental. I put this on Luna and she didn’t bother her. Great fitting product with plenty room for adjustments on the Velcro straps. Good quality material. Really high visibility so no mistaking her for a coyote when we are working at the farm. I bought one for her cousin Scooter, a Labrador Collie speedster. After four miles of run and swim this vest was still in great shape and stayed on! Price point and quality are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Thin and light weight but don't be fooled. My dog 30 lb. ACD doesn't mind wearing it at all. (Excellent fit and the velcro is really tight gripping.) Very reflective and extremely visible. I no longer worry about living in a hunting area with my dog at risk. Held this under a running faucet and the water just ran off without the vest being wet. I fully expect this to last for several years. I highly recommend this vest. Would love to be able to buy a second one that had a fleece kind of lining for the cold winter months.
customer_reviews.author: michigan

customer_reviews.title: Just what the dogs need!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several vests as Christmas gifts for dogs belonging to friends who live in the country as well as for friends who live in the city. The country dogs need protection especially during hunting season. The city dogs need to be seen on evening walks. I am pleased with the overall quality of the vests. The fabric is both lightweight and waterproof. The Velcro on both straps will allow the vests to be perfectly fitted to each dog. I emailed a question to the seller and they responded quickly - great customer service! I will update my review after Christmas when I hear how the vests work out.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: It took our 90 lb puppy a bit to get used to, but has been a wonderful item to have him wear on our daily walks in the woods in season (our property is near hunting grounds). The vest provides excellent visibility & has been durable so far through undergrowth and big puppy teeth.
customer_reviews.author: JanM

customer_reviews.title: "Fashion" might be stretching it a bit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great reflective vest! Size Small fits our 22-pound muscle-y mini schnauzer just right. (Not that he likes wearing it, though.) The velcro straps are long and that makes them highly adjustable. Construction of the garment is very good. This is a great addition to his wardrobe and will improve his chances of NOT getting shot during hunting season and of NOT getting hit by a car at night! Double goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hunting season and night time walks
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright orange and the reflective material. The material is thin and tore a little bit when our dogs were roughhousing but a little duct tape fixed that and we're very satisfied. These did exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: VERY reflective dog vest.
customer_reviews.text: This reflective dog vest is VERY reflective. Our beagle loves to hike with us in the woods and she wears this vest so we can see her from far away. She is slim and weighs about 29 lbs and the small fits her perfectly. We've washed it twice and it's starting to fray slightly but she's been wearing it all winter, several times a week so I feel it's held up pretty good. The vest is very reasonably priced so I wouldn't mind buying a new one every year or two if needed. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla D

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I already have an LED collar but can be hard to see since my partner has put on his winter coat. (Australian Shepherd). He comes to work with me every single day and our shop is on a heavily travelled road. With the time change I wanted something more to make him visible, god forbid he were to stray into the road. This thing is BRIGHT!! Very reflective and highly visible. Plus he thinks he’s pretty cool when he’s got it on. :)
customer_reviews.author: J-rod

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My dog Lucy is a pit mix. She is approximately 42# with a broad chest. Her measurements were on the low side of medium on the chart. I opted to try the small instead of the medium. Small wad a good choice. It fit her great and she loved wearing it! Great product. Well made and durable!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my dog!
customer_reviews.text: The vest is very bright and reflective, and best of all, my dog looks so darn cute wearing it! It is thin material, but that is what you want so the dog doesn't overheat on a summer day. Because it is thin, I am not sure how well it would hold up if I allowed her to run off-leash through the woods. The vest fits my needs because she will only wear it when she trots alongside me on my e-trike.
customer_reviews.author: IP555

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility and sticking power!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pitbull mix and a dobie mix that I rarely leash while hiking. I don't really use the trail systems so they do a large amount of high speed crashing through shrubs, pricker bushes, swamps, branches, you name it. I love being able to see them and feeling more secure that they might not get shot (my rust dobie mix does resemble a small high energy deer at times). I can wipe these clean when they feel the need to play 'swamp thing' and the Velcro hasn't come lose at all. They don't seem restricted or too warm while wearing them. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Duchess of Sheep

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you’ll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and provides you with a little more security while walking your dog. My Border Collie is an off leash dog and he’s easy to track in the woods or on walks day or night (carry small flashlight at night as vest illuminates extremely well. Vest does not interfere with movement. Manufacturer could place the belly strap back slightly (1”) to be just behind last rib. Otherwise I’m glad I purchased and my dog can’t wait to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable for my dog and great fit
customer_reviews.text: The reflection features are very vibrant, very easy to see the dog even at dark. The reflection feature is very bright when any light shines on it. My dog happily wears this and is not bothered at all by it. Seems to be a very comfortable fit and can adjust in size with the velcro straps.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery but still not sturdy enough for our Max!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased three vests for our dog to wear when he goes for a run in the woods. My husband wants to be sure he isn’t mistaken for a deer. He seems to split them on limbs and fences. These two were stronger than the first one we ordered but they still get snagged.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce V

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - Have Bought This Vest Multiple Times (Very Active, Big Dogs)
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this vest over and over again for my dogs, as well as for gifts for other dogs. My dogs are very active and these vests last much longer than others I have purchased. I love how many reflective areas there are, including the paw prints, as well as the comfortable wide straps. The vest is easy to put on and comes out great in the wash (line dry). I use this almost all year round - hunting season, fog, rain, snow, night, you name it. It is easy to spot your dog from far away and in my opinion, is a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McLain

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest fits my weimaraner a lot better than the last one I bought because it's a little longer. It seems to be very well made and of materials that will last. He wears the vest to make him visible in the woods for our walks during hunting season. He always rolls several times whenever he has to wear a vest and this one stays put. So far it appears to be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: oktransplant

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!! Great light reflectivity!
customer_reviews.text: A very bright vest that should work well for my husky during hunting season. I have had some bad experiences hunting on public land where other hunters are shooting in my direction at an animal that is right between us. There should be no excuses for such idiotic behavior. ALWAYS BE SURE OF YOUR TARGET AND WHAT IS BEYOND IT BEFORE YOU SHOOT! Anyway. This vest is extremely bright and there should be no issues being seen, or having anyone mistake her for a coyote or a wolf. She is a husky, husky. Weighing in at 80lbs and the large fits her by about 2-3inches. Thanks for helping to keep my dog safe!!!
customer_reviews.author: 11bravo

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!
customer_reviews.text: The size chart was helpful and accurate. I have a 47lb lab/Australian sheherd mix and the medium fit perfectly. At night the reflective material was very visible. I plan on hiking with her in NH soon and this will make for a safer hike during hunting season. I haven't used it in the rain yet so I can't comment on how water repellent it it, but it appears that it would keep her pretty dry. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M.O.H.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be very well built.
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest. Kind of a rubbery material but that is a plus. Hoping it won’t tear as easily as mesh. Definetly shouldn’t hang up. We live rural and with no lighting on our dirt roads a vest that reflects light is a definite must for human and dogs during evening walks.
customer_reviews.author: Odie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright and make it easy to see our two dogs during the day and at night. We live in the country where people hunt, so we got these for our dogs to wear when running on our property and when we're out for our walks. They are easily adjustable and fit our German shepherds great (both about 80 lbs.).
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hunting season!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our one year old yellow lab to use for walks/four wheeling in the woods. He’s about 65 lbs and the large fits great with plenty of room to adjust as he grows. The velcro stays put to prevent him getting caught on branches and sticks as he runs through the woods. Works great in the snow and when he decides to jump in the river. Drys quickly. See pics, you can’t miss him in this vest. He’s more than 100 yards away in the second pic.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility in forest & city
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for running my dog in the woods during hunting season, but it has become an in town staple! We live on a super busy street and almost all of our winter walks are in the dark. My pup is so much more visible with the vest. As a bonus, my dog walks on leash like an absolute prince while wearing the vest! I don’t understand, but he doesn’t pull at all. The vest is also great for visibility in the forest as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Vest for Visibility During Hunting Season & Beyond
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dog vest for hunting season, being easily seen during the day & at night. The paw on the rear is a great reflector. I bought a L for our 82lb Lab and my mother loved it so hard I bought a M for her 55lb English Pointer. Streamlined, well-contructed without being too constrictive, easy to put on and remove -- would recommend for any dog with a shape like a Lab or pointer -- not sure how it would work on English bulldogs, for example.
customer_reviews.author: Annaconda

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest - Stay on!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Maine -- lots of hunters. We got this for our 80 lb. German Sheppard Kairos. He and our other large dogs had had others before that they did not like and were usually able to pull off. This one is a little short (only goes 1/2 down the back) but whether intentional or not, that's great because Kairos can't get it in his teeth when he seems to be bothered by it. The result: after a few seconds he ignores it! He has run through the woods (including through brushy areas) and the vest stays on. It is also very easy to take on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Crain

customer_reviews.title: I love the bright orange and the reflectors on the side ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smaller one last year for my puppy. It is made of "tough" material. She outgrew the small so I ordered the medium. For some reason, I did not receive it and when I contacted the company, they immediately reimbursed me. I reordered the medium and received it in just a couple of days. I love the bright orange and the reflectors on the side are great! Great company, and super pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: daisy399

customer_reviews.title: But the construction / design work great on our 85 pound Boxer
customer_reviews.text: So far anyway, I'm very impressed! It's well designed and laid out. I'm not sure how durable it will be yet. It's not very thick. But the construction / design work great on our 85 pound Boxer. So often we have nearly been run down in crosswalks. I'm hoping that this will help make things safer for us. So far more drivers than usual have been stopping for us. I know it's helping! :-)
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to walk my Labrador in the woods nearby during hunting season-Private land, but I wanted to be cautious. I bought a large. It fit well. He can run and swim in it without problem. I ordered two more for when other family with dogs visit.
customer_reviews.author: lab lover

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. My dog wears it every night on our walk. It only took him a couple days to get used to it. So easy to put on and now he jumps around when I pull it out because he knows it means walk time! High visibility and it has already made a difference at least a few times!
customer_reviews.author: HollyRose

customer_reviews.title: Really cool for dark nights as well as cloudy days when I want to make sure drivers see him.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our large 105lbs Gerberian Shepsky. Not much overlap on the Velcro but enough it stays on. He seems to like it. I did have to cut a slot so I could clasp his leash to his harness but the fabric doesn’t ravel so not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Racquetball Girl

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the vest at first..it fit well, nice reflectivity. Then the grey reflective border started to peal away from the orange vest. My dog is running on 3 acres with lots of trees and bushes. I thought it was a fluke and bought another. The same thing happened to the second vest within 2 days of putting it on. It seems that these vests are just not sewn for active dogs who are constantly on the move. Nice idea, just not durable.
customer_reviews.author: VetMomof3

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy. We needed a blaze orange vest for ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. We needed a blaze orange vest for our dog to keep her safe as we walk our land and hike through the woods in Vermont during hunting season. This reflective vest is easy to put on the dog (I just unvelcro the bottom strap, slip the other over her head and velcro it around her torso) and highly visible. Also, the reflective material makes her highly visible at night! It is light weight. Even my dog who hates to have anything on her body other than her collar, does quite well with this vest. Thank you SafetyPup for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: LABlackburn

customer_reviews.title: We and our dog LOVE her new vest
customer_reviews.text: We and our dog LOVE her new vest! It’s bright and reflective, and fits her well. I especially like the velcro straps – much easier to put on and adjust than clips! We use it when we take walks in the woods behind our house, especially during hunting season, so that our black lab is not mistaken for a small bear. The product is awesome, and I’ve been telling all my dog-loving friends about it and the great service we got from SJS Direct. Amazon, thanks for carrying their products!
customer_reviews.author: L. Lindner

customer_reviews.title: Have already purchased 2.
customer_reviews.text: Have already purchased my second. I live on 14 acres, surrounded by forest (& hunters). My dog is 40 lbs & black. My family thinks it's silly, but I like it very much. I can find him easily when he's outside.
customer_reviews.author: N. Arsenault

customer_reviews.title: Great for reflective quality and taking your dog in the woods around hunting season
customer_reviews.text: Great for reflective quality and taking your dog in the woods around hunting season. The blaze orange is bright enough. Fit's my 85-90 lb lab/shepherd mix.
customer_reviews.author: Karla K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! We are very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We are very happy. Our dog is a 50lb shepherd-husky mix - she is not super big, but has a deep chest. The overlapping sizes made it easy to find a good fit (She has a 30-inch chest and we got a large). She does not seem to mind wearing it at all - it stays in place and she's able to move freely. It's lightweight, but very decent quality for the price. Well worth the money and peace of mind since we often enjoy running/hiking the game lands in our area.
customer_reviews.author: Jocie B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the vest
customer_reviews.text: Love the vest. It is very lightweight and quiet when on. The Velcro straps allow for a custom fit. They are pretty strong/grippy, so this won't come loose or fall off. I have a 50lb Goldendoodle, and would not want to put the size I have on a dog any smaller. The reflective features are very visible at night when illuminated by light. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Super Visibility, enjoyable for our dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic vest for anyone that has a dog that could get near a highway, or having it outside during hunting season. Additionally It helps keep my dog dry and warm. It's extremely high visibility luminescent as you can see from the picture I posted. The dog in the picture enjoys wearing the vest and steps up to allow his owner to put it on. This is an excellent purchase that I'm glad I got. There was nothing like it at any of the pet places in our small town.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Ed

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Note
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Note: the Velcro will tear from vest, if you don't grab carefully before pulling. This turned out to be a good thing for our pup who got caught deep in the woods in heavy branches and was able to tear loose from it to escape. If the Velcro was much stronger, she would have been in a pickle. We use for all three Goldens during hunting season and have purchased several as gifts for our daughter's pups.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and holds up under heavy abuse.
customer_reviews.text: Hold up well! My dog romps through the deep woods a lot and other similar vests end up shredded or ripped off. This one stays on and has hardly a scratch. Only negative comments is that it tends to slide off to one side or the other.
customer_reviews.author: Moosenuts J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hunting Safety Vest
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these vests to keep my dogs visable when hunting upland game birds. In heavy cover the vests are very helpful. As I also hunt with other hunters the vests are a very valuable in keeping all aware of the dogs location when birds flush. I don't go hunting with out the vests. There are several safety vests on the market, this brand has been the best that I have tried. It is more durable and I prefer the way this one fits my dogs. All of them tear in rough cover, but these are easier to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Serious Visibility
customer_reviews.text: My primary reason for this purchase was visibility. We run in the woods during deer season this with a hunters orange collar with led light keeps us safe
customer_reviews.author: sheperdess

customer_reviews.title: Blk Lab, Large fits great.
customer_reviews.text: My blk lab hates all vests, including this one! She pouts its funny. At any rate this vest seems like the most comfortable and definately the most visible. Which is important for the spoiled dog.
customer_reviews.author: Working family

customer_reviews.title: perfect length for my long dog though
customer_reviews.text: medium is way too big for my 40 pound corgi/husky. should have bought the small but I didn't realize there was not free return shipping. he wears it anyways, it just goes all the way down his sides haha. perfect length for my long dog though. I also have a 40 pound blue heeler, medium is WAYYYY to big for her. I bought this one because it started at "22 pounds"
customer_reviews.author: Angela R

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. Very reflective and makes my brown labordoodle easy to see in the woods. Only part we don’t like is the paw prints on the back with a heart... cheesy.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

product_meta.title: SafetyPUP XD - Protect Your Best Friend. Our Hi-Vis Fluorescent, Reflective Dog Vest Provides Crucial Visibility Helping You Safeguard Your Pet from Cars & Hunting Accidents, On or Off Leash
feature_bullets: SIZING - Fits Dogs 61 lbs to 100 lbs. Chest Diameter 27.5" - 35.75"
DURABILITY - 300D Oxford Weave fabric and reinforced stitching ensures a more durable vest to withstand the activity of a playful dog.
SAFETY Blaze orange fabric and reflective trim make your pet highly visible to both cars and hunters helping to avoid accidents.
COMFORTABLE - Easy adjustable straps and dual sided fabric keeps the vest comfortably in place eliminating chaffing and resistance to wearing protective apparel.
GUARANTEED Purchase risk free, thanks to our 100% money back guarantee! If you aren't satisfied for any reason, we will refund your money - no questions asked!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
